instructions:
This is the Offical Sheet for **HC SVNT DRACONES: Second Edition**.

* `Total Mass`,`Total Move` and `Cargo Points` are calcualted automatically
* Experience Page: Changes made to the `Notoriety Purchase Tracking` and `Landmark Automatic Benefits`-sections doesn't affect other parts of the sheet, and must be manually changed.
* Experience Page: Changes made on the `Large EXP table` automatically edit your `stats` accordingly, as well as `credits` and values in the `Progression Purchse Tracking`-section
* Initiative roll button, can be called with `%{character_name|init}`
* roll template, example: `&{template:hsd2} {{title=big title}} {{subtitle=optional subtitle}} {{color=white}} {{normal=section like default roll template}} {{rollexample =[[2d10+2]] }} {{desc=wide section better suited for descriptions. color section is optional, defaults to grey. Other color options are white, black, red}}`

* Sheet Version 1.75 - See [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Hc%20Svnt%20Dracones%20Second%20Edition) for Sheet Changelog

 [Game's homepage](https://hsdroleplayinggame.com/)
